title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Remote Language Learning Course Design for Professionals in Their 40s

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can engage in simple daily conversations using 100 basic vocabulary items and 5 essential grammar rules within one week

Learners apply three or more self-directed language learning strategies using digital platforms (Zoom, LMS)
